summary: The vengeful doctor rises again, seeking the Scrolls of Life in an attempt to resurrect his deceased wife.
cast: Vincent Price|Robert Quarry|Valli Kemp|Hugh Griffith|John Thaw|Keith Buckley|Lewis Fiander|Gerald Sim|Milton Reid|Peter Jeffrey|John Cater|Peter Cushing|Beryl Reid|Terry-Thomas|Fiona Lewis|John Comer|Caroline Munro|Gary Owens
title: El retorno del Doctor Phibes
